hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that:Allah's Messenger (S) said: "Whoever did not pray the two Rak'ah (before) Fajr then let him pray them after the sun has risen

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي إِعَادَتِهِمَا بَعْدَ طُلُوعِ الشَّمْسِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Waiting To Perform Them After The Sun Has Risen
